ComicInfo.Title: Spring Training; Fast 'n Furrious; How To Draw... Lucy Van Pelt; Classic Peanuts Strips
ComicInfo.Summary: From the newspaper strips to the animated specials, Charlie Brown, Snoopy, and the Peanuts gang have held a special place in America's heart since their first appearance in 1950. Let that young reader in your household discover these beloved characters like they were brand new! Peppermint Patty and Marcy join the series in 'School Daze,' and Charlie Brown dons his Manager's cap for another year of Spring Training. Includes classic Sunday strips from Charles Schulz and a special Linus 'First Appearance' variant cover!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-12 16:36:00. [CVDB325075]
ComicInfo.Writer: Charles M. Schulz, Shane Houghton, Vicki Scott
ComicInfo.Penciller: Bob Scott, Charles M. Schulz, Matt Whitlock, Vicki Scott
ComicInfo.Inker: Charles M. Schulz, Matt Whitlock, Paige Braddock
ComicInfo.Colorist: Alexis E. Fajardo, Justin Thompson, Lisa Moore, Nina Taylor Kester
ComicInfo.Editor: Adam Staffaroni, Alexis E. Fajardo, Matt Gagnon
ComicInfo.Characters: Charlie Brown, Franklin, Frieda, Linus van Pelt, Lucy van Pelt, Pig-Pen, Schroeder, Shermy, Snoopy, Violet Gray
